answers.text: A NAT Gateway Service is an EC2 instance you must manage yourself in a public subnet, it can be cheaper. A NAT Instance is a fully-managed, highly-available NAT service. It has a higher bandwidth.
A NAT instance is an EC2 instance you must manage yourself in a public subnet, it can be cheaper. A NAT Gateway Service is a fully-managed, highly-available NAT service. It has a higher bandwidth.
A NAT Gateway requires at least 2 EC2 instances to be manually configured. A NAT Instance provisions these 2 EC2 instances automatically hence making administration easier.
A NAT instance requires at least 2 EC2 instances to be manually configured. A NAT Gateway provisions these 2 EC2 instances automatically hence making administration easier.

text: What is a major difference between a NAT instance and a NAT Gateway Service?
